requirements.name: LRE_Beh
requirements.description: A State Machine named "LRE_Beh" shall be created to model the behaviour of the LRE.

requirements.name: Variable1
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "cobs" of type Close (defined by the "AUV platform"), to denote the closest obstacle.

requirements.name: Variable2
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "inOPEZ" of type boolean (defined by the AUV platform), to denote if the AUV is in an Object Proximity Exclusion Zone (OPEZ).

requirements.name: Variable3
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "hvel" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the AVU's horizontal velocity.

requirements.name: Variable4
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "vvel" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the AVU's vertical velocity.

requirements.name: Variable5
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "cstc" of type Obstacle (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the closest static obstacle.

requirements.name: Variable6
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "cdyn" of type Obstacle (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the closest dynamic obstacle.

requirements.name: Variable7
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "depth" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the depth of the AUV.

requirements.name: Variable8
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Variable "CDA" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the Closest Distance of Approach to an obstacle.

requirements.name: Constant1
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Constant "AvoidanceMargin" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the avoidance margin to obstacles.

requirements.name: Constant2
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Constant "StaticObsHorizDist" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the shortest distance allowed horizontally to an obstacle.

requirements.name: Constant3
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Constant "StaticObsVertDist" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the shortest distance allowed vertically to an obstacle.

requirements.name: Constant5
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Constant "MinSafeDist" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the minimal overall safe distance allowed to an obstacle.

requirements.name: Variable9
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a variable "TCPA" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the Time at Closest Point of Approach to an obstacle.

requirements.name: Variable10
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a variable "x" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the parameter to be passed to other components of the AUV.

requirements.name: Constant4
requirements.description: LRE_Beh shall define a Constant "StaticObsDfltVertDist" of type real (defined by the AUV platform), to denote the default vertical distance limit to a static obstacle.

requirements.name: State1
requirements.description: The LRE shall define a State named "OCM" (Operation Control Mode).

requirements.name: State2
requirements.description: The LRE shall define a State named "MOM" (Main Operating Mode). On entrying MOM, the Event (from the Interface "Output") "advVel" should be tiggered to advice the velocity of AUV to 1.

requirements.name: State3
requirements.description: The LRE shall define a State named "CAM" (Collision Avoidance Mode).

requirements.name: State4
requirements.description: The LRE shall define a State named "HCM" (High Caution Mode). On entrying HCM, the Event (from the Interface "Output") "advVel" should be tiggered to advice the velocity of AUV to 1.

requirements.name: Beh1
requirements.description: On start up, the LRE shall be in the the OCM mode.

requirements.name: Beh2
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from OCM to OCM if the Event "reqVel" (from the Interface "Input") is triggered, the returned value of the Event shall be stored in variable "x". Then the event "advVel" (from the Interface "Output") shall be triggered, to pass the value of "x".

requirements.name: Beh3
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from OCM to OCM if the Event "reqHdng" (from the Interface "Input") is triggered, the returned value of the Event shall be stored in variable "x". Then the Event "advHdng" (from the Interface "Output") shall be triggered, to pass the value of "x".

requirements.name: Beh4
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from OCM to MOM, with a trigger Event "reqMOM" (from the Interface "Input"), with the condition that: the velocity ("vel") of the AUV is less than 0.1, the distance from the AUV to the closest dynamic obstacle is greater than 7.5, the the distance from the AUV to the closest static obstacle is greater than 0.3, and that the AUV is not in an OPEZ.

requirements.name: Beh5
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to OCM, if it determines that it is in an OPEZ ("inOPEZ").

requirements.name: Beh6
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to OCM, if the Event "reqOCM" is triggered.

requirements.name: Beh8
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to CAM, if it determines that the Closest Distance of Approach ("CDA") to an obstacle is less than the defined minimal overall safe distance allowed to an obstacle ("MinSafeDist"), and that the Time at Closest Point of Approach to an obstacle ("TCPA") is greater than or equal to 0.

requirements.name: Beh7
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to OCM, if the Event "endTask" is triggered, then the LRE triggers the Event "advVel", to set the velocity of the AUV to 0.

requirements.name: Beh9
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to HCM, if the horizontal velocity ("hvel") is greater than or equal to 0.1, the horizontal distance ("hdist") to the closest static obstacle ("cstc") is less than the defined allowed horizontal distance to static osbstacle ("StaticObsHorizDist").

requirements.name: Beh10
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to HCM, if the vertical distance (call to "vdist") to the closest static obstacle ("cstc") is less than or equal to the defined allowed default vertical distance to a static obstacle ("StaticObsDfltVertDist").

requirements.name: Beh11
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to HCM, if the vertical velocity (call to "hvel") is greater than or equal to 0.1, the vertical distance (call to "hdist") to the closest static obstacle ("cstc") is less than the defined allowed vertical distance to static osbstacle ("StaticObsVertDist").

requirements.name: Beh12
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from MOM to HCM, if the Event "reqHCM" is triggered.

requirements.name: Beh13
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from HCM to MOM, if the horizontal distance (call to "hdist") to the closest static obstacle ("cstc") is greater than the allowed horizondal distance to a static obstacle ("StaticObsHorzDist"), and the vertical distance (call to "vdist") to the closest static obstacle ("cstc") is greater than the allowed vertical distance to a static obstacle ("StaticObsVertDist").

requirements.name: Beh14
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from HCM to CAM, if the the Closest Distance of Approach ("CDA") to an obstacle is less than the defined minimal safe distance allowed to an obstacle ("MinSafeDist"), and that the Time at Closest Point of Approach to an obstacle ("TCPA") is greater than or equal to 0.

requirements.name: Beh15
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from HCM to OCM, if the Event "reqOCM" is triggered.

requirements.name: Beh16
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from HCM to OCM, if it determines that it is in an OPEZ ("inOPEZ").

requirements.name: Beh17
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from CAM to OCM, if the Event "reqOCM" is triggered.

requirements.name: Beh18
requirements.description: The LRE shall transition from CAM to OCM, if the the Closest Distance of Approach ("CDA") to an obstacle is greater than or equal to the defined minimal safe distance allowed to an obstacle ("MinSafeDist").

requirements.name: Function1
requirements.description: The "AUV_Module" shall provide a Function named "odist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").

requirements.name: Function2
requirements.description: The "AUV_Module" shall provide a Function named "hdist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the horizontal distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").

requirements.name: Function3
requirements.description: The "AUV_Module" shall provide a Function named "vdist", which takes an "Obstacle" as input, that returns the vertical distance from the AUV to the Obstacle (as "real").
